name: mfm-js
description: An MFM parser implementation with PEG.js

scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run peg
scripts.build-debug: npm run tsc && npm run peg-debug
scripts.peg: peggy --cache -o src/internal/parser.js --allowed-start-rules fullParser,plainParser src/internal/parser.pegjs && npm run peg-copy
scripts.peg-debug: peggy --cache -o src/internal/parser.js --allowed-start-rules fullParser,inlineParser,plainParser --trace src/internal/parser.pegjs && npm run peg-copy
scripts.test: npm run jest && npm run tsd

author: Marihachi
